localPointToWorldPoint

  • localPointToWorldPoint(localPoint: VectorE3, worldPoint: VectorE3): void

  • Inherited from RigidBody3.localPointToWorldPoint

    • Defined in davinci-newton/engine3D/RigidBody3.ts:333

    Converts a point in local coordinates to the same point in world coordinates. x = R (localPoint - centerOfMassLocal) * ~R + X

    Parameters

    • localPoint: VectorE3
    • worldPoint: VectorE3

    In the following formula, notice the reversion on either Î© or L. Geometrically, this means we depend on the cosine of the angle between the bivectors, since A ~B = |A||B|cos(...).
